abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that while New York Mets are doing extremely well so far, having tied their previous record of 11-game winning streak, success could simply be indication that other National League East teams are particularly bad this season; upcoming series against New York Yankees could prove to be indication of how well Mets will do in regular season.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, who host the Subway Series beginning Friday, have won six of seven. But no team is playing as well as the Mets, who have a chance to do something they have never done in their history.

headline.main: Next Stop on Mets’ Express: The Bronx
headline.print_headline: Next Stop on Mets’ Express: The Bronx
